title: Nothing is happening once i click launch on LoL
body:
Recently i've been getting quite a few problems loading games ( due to a directx9 problem ) it wouldn't let me connect. I thought i'd uninstall and then reinstall it and start fresh, now i'm currently unable to even get past the first screen. I open League and once i hit the "LAUNCH" button nothing happens. Can anybody help me solve this? 

Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Do not bump discussions. This ain't the forums. Bumping has no effect. If anything you want to avoid doing that so your post is more likely to remain at the top, due to not getting a negative reputation.

Anyway,

have you tried reinstalling?
